Description: Saudi Arabia Refineries Co (known as: SARCO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 1993. SARCO operates within the Energy sector focusing on Oil and Gas Refining and Marketing. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. SARCO is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1960.
